mapper.select: SELECT bsk.bskSeq ,pr.prSeq ,prup.upPath ,prup.upUuidName ,pr.prName ,pr.prTotalPrice ,bsk.bskAmount ,bsk.bskSell_Price FROM basket bsk JOIN product pr ON bsk.bsk_prSeq = pr.prSeq JOIN productUploaded prup ON bsk.bsk_prSeq = prup.up_prSeq WHERE bsk.bsk_mmSeq = #{mmSeq} AND prup.upType = 1 AND prup.upDefaultNy = 1

SELECT mm.mmSeq ,mm.mmName ,mm.mmPhoneNumber ,mm.mmEmail ,mm.mmGrade ,adr.adrSeq ,adr.adrName ,adr.adrZipcode ,adr.adrAddress ,adr.adrAddressDetail ,adr.adrPhoneNumber FROM member mm JOIN address adr ON adr.adr_mmSeq = mm.mmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND mm.mmSeq = #{mmSeq} AND adrdefaultNy = 1
